brainly_data.question: Amena is assigned a sample mixture to separate in chemistry class. She knows it is an emulsion of oil and salt water that also contains some suspended solids. Place the steps in the order that makes the most sense for separating the salt from the mixture. (1 = first, 4 = last) Remove the top layer. Screen the mixture through a fine mesh. Centrifuge the mixture. Heat the mixture to the boiling temperature of water until it evaporates completely.
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: Amena is assigned a sample mixture to separate in chemistry class. She knows it is an emulsion of oil and salt water that also contains some suspended solids. Place the steps in the order that makes the most sense for separating the salt from the mixture. (1 = first, 4 = last) Remove the top layer. Screen the mixture through a fine mesh. Centrifuge the mixture. Heat the mixture to the boiling temperature of water until it evaporates completely.
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: The steps in the order that makes the most sense for separating the salt from the mixture are 3, 1, 2, 4
